summary:
Nazi Germany was a dictatorship led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party from 1933 to 1945. It was a dark time when the Nazis controlled Germany and caused a lot of harm. They believed in racism and thought Germans were superior. They hurt and killed many people, especially Jews, and started World War II by invading other countries.

Hitler became very powerful and controlled everything. He started a big war, but in the end, Germany lost, and he took his own life. After the war, the world made sure to punish the Nazis and stop their bad ideas.
title: Nazi Germany
